info.name: CT Scan - Radiation Leakage Level API
info.description: Collection for testing Radiation Leakage Level APIs for CT Scan machines. Includes Create, GetById, and Update operations.

item.name: 1️⃣ Create Radiation Leakage Test (by Service ID)

body.raw:
{
  "workload": "500",
  "workloadUnit": "mA·min/week",
  "measurementSettings": [
    { "kv": "120", "ma": "100", "time": "1.0" },
    { "kv": "100", "ma": "80", "time": "1.2" }
  ],
  "leakageMeasurements": [
    {
      "location": "Tube Housing",
      "front": "0.45",
      "back": "0.32",
      "left": "0.40",
      "right": "0.42",
      "max": "0.45",
      "unit": "mGy/h",
      "remark": "Pass"
    },
    {
      "location": "Collimator",
      "front": "0.35",
      "back": "0.38",
      "left": "0.36",
      "right": "0.34",
      "max": "0.38",
      "unit": "mGy/h",
      "remark": "Pass"
    }
  ],
  "maxLeakageResult": "0.065",
  "maxRadiationLeakage": "0.00057",
  "toleranceValue": "1.0",
  "toleranceOperator": "less than or equal to",
  "toleranceTime": "1",
  "tolerance": "≤ 1.0 mGy/h at 1 m distance (AERB limit)",
  "notes": "All leakage values are within permissible limits as per AERB."
}

request.description: Creates a Radiation Leakage Level test record and links it to the Service Report for the given CT Scan service ID.

item.name: 2️⃣ Get Radiation Leakage Test by Test ID

request.description: Fetches a specific Radiation Leakage test record by its testId.

item.name: 3️⃣ Update Radiation Leakage Test by Test ID

request.description: Updates an existing Radiation Leakage Level test record by testId.
